pages.text: $(li)The Punch enchantment can be applied in any Bow.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the knockback strenght inflicted of your enemies of the Arrows fires from the enchanted Bow, pushing them further.
pages.title: Punch

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Punch).
